00022 #ifndef _MetadataBlock_h
00023 #define _MetadataBlock_h
00024 
00025 #include "VRTObject.h"
00026 #include "VRTMath.h"
00027 #include <vector>
00028 #include "string.h"    // required for memcpy(..) on GCC4.4/libc6 2.11.1

00030 namespace vrt {
00032   class MetadataEntry : public VRTObject {
00033     private: int32_t  level;   // The level
00034     private: string   key;     // The key
00035     private: wstring  val;     // The value
00036     private: bool     keyNull; // Is the key null?
00037     private: bool     valNull; // Is the val null?
00038 
00040     public: ~MetadataEntry () { }
00041 
00043     public: MetadataEntry (const MetadataEntry &m);
00044 
00046     public: MetadataEntry ();
00047 
00053     public: MetadataEntry (int32_t level, const string &key, const wstring &val);
00054 
00056     public: virtual string toString () const;
00057 
00059     public: virtual inline bool isNull () const {
00060       return (level == -1);
00061     }
00062 
00064     public: inline int32_t getLevel () const {
00065       return level;
00066     }
00067 
00069     public: inline void setLevel (int32_t l) {
00070       if ((l < 0) || (l > 4095)) {
00071         throw VRTException("Invalid level (%d), value must be in range [0,4095]", l);
00072       }
00073       this->level = l;
00074     }
00075 
00077     public: inline string getKey () const {
00078       return key;
00079     }
00080 
00082     public: void setKey (const string *key);
00083 
00085     public: inline void setKey (const string &k) {
00086       setKey(&k);
00087     }
00088 
00090     public: inline wstring getValue () const {
00091       return val;
00092     }
00093 
00095     public: void setValue (const wstring *val);
00096 
00098     public: inline void setValue (const wstring &v) {
00099       setValue(&v);
00100     }
00101 
00110     public: int32_t writeBytes (vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, int32_t len) const;
00111 
00112 
00119     public: int32_t readBytes (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, int32_t len);
00120   };
00121 
00173   class MetadataBlock : public VRTObject {
00174     private: vector<MetadataEntry> entries;
00175 
00177     public: ~MetadataBlock () { }
00178 
00180     public: MetadataBlock (const MetadataBlock &m);
00181 
00183     public: MetadataBlock ();
00184 
00186     public: MetadataBlock (const vector<MetadataEntry> &entries);
00187 
00189     public: virtual string toString () const;
00190 
00192     public: virtual inline bool isNull () const {
00193       return (entries.size() == 0);
00194     }
00195 
00201     public: int32_t getLengthInBytes () const;
00202 
00204     public: inline vector<MetadataEntry> getEntries () const {
00205       return entries;
00206     }
00207 
00209     public: inline vector<MetadataEntry> *getEntriesPointer () {
00210       return &entries;
00211     }
00212 
00214     public: inline void setEntries (const vector<MetadataEntry> &_entries) {
00215       this->entries = _entries;
00216     }
00217 
00225     public: void readBytes (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, int32_t len, bool keepNull=false);
00226 
00235     public: int32_t writeBytes (vector<char> &buf, int32_t off, int32_t len) const;
00236   };
